item.title: New Year's resolutions
item.author: diegojromerolopez@gmail.com (Diego J. Romero-López)
item.description: New Year’s resolutions This new year has just started (well 27 days ago), but I have been thinking about what I would like to learn and change during this 2024. Here are my personal thoughts on the matter. I hope they could inspire you to do a similar list. What I would like to learn Tech Domain Driven Design Code bases I have worked on in my career tend to have some tech debt, and the code structure is very different depending on the developer that created the code.
